name: UFO Gaming
introduce: UFO Gaming is a decentralized gaming platform bridging traditional games onto the blockchain and giving players the ability to earn while playing. Players come together to create their own clans, own and trade virtual land, and earn NFTs and cryptocurrency, all within the Dark Metaverse. In The Dark Metaverse, each game will represent its own planet. The first game released in the Dark Metaverse will be Super Galactic.
